Title: The Slicer
Plot: Elaine is having nightmares and sleepless nights due to her neighbor's inconsideracy. The neighbor is out of the country and has left her alarm clock set for 3:30 a.m.. George gets a dream job at a very badly run company, his new boss seems familiar to him, then a photo in the boss's office reminds him of "the boom box incident." Fearing that he might lose his new position, George listens to Kramer's advice and plots to get hold of the photograph and get it retouched. Kramer's dissatisfied with
Writer: Gregg Kavet, Andy Robin, Darin Henry
GuestStars: Marcia Cross, Daniel Von Bargen, Larry B. Scott, David Moreland
